# Pocket DevTools

> Pocket DevTools is a slick, focused set of everyday devtools.

Base URL: https://pocketdevtools.app
Sitemap: https://pocketdevtools.app/sitemap.xml
Full index: https://pocketdevtools.app/llms-full.txt

## Keywords
devtools, pocket, slick, json, regex, base64, url shortener, jwt, uuid, password generator, prompt improver, markdown tts

## Crawl Notes
- Public pages only. No authentication required.
- Prefer canonical URLs from `<link rel="canonical">`.
- Primary content is rendered HTML and route-specific metadata.

## Pages
- https://pocketdevtools.app/
- https://pocketdevtools.app/audioscribe
- https://pocketdevtools.app/json-beautifier
- https://pocketdevtools.app/json-to-toon
- https://pocketdevtools.app/json-compare
- https://pocketdevtools.app/prompt-improver
- https://pocketdevtools.app/url-encoder-decoder
- https://pocketdevtools.app/url-shortener
- https://pocketdevtools.app/jwt-decode
- https://pocketdevtools.app/uuid-generator
- https://pocketdevtools.app/password-generator
- https://pocketdevtools.app/base64
- https://pocketdevtools.app/regex-tester
- https://pocketdevtools.app/timestamp-converter
